title: Client keeps having to update when I open it
body: ^ Basically the title. Whenever I open the client one of the older splash arts appear and then a message pops up saying something like "We are installing a newer patch". Hoping the problem goes away with the 7.14 patch, but in case it doesn't, I was wondering what I could do to fix it, thx <3.

replies.body: It sounds like those patches might not actually be applying correctly the first time around. Try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and make sure to run in with **Force Repatch** turned on to make sure all the patch files are working properly. Feel free to hit me back up if that doesn't help!
